scheme_name: Government Institutions for Teaching and Training of Persons with Disabilities
implementing_agency: Social Welfare Department, Government Of Chhattisgarh
brief_description: The objective of the scheme is to arrange for education and rehabilitation of children with disabilities by providing them free hostel, education-training, food, clothing and residential facilities.
detailed_description: The scheme &quot;Government Institutions for Teaching and Training of Persons with Disabilities&quot; was implemented by the Social Welfare Department, Government of Chhattisgarh. The objective of the scheme is to arrange for the education and rehabilitation of children with disabilities by providing them free hostel, education-training, food, clothing, and residential facilities.
benefits: Under the scheme, beneficiaries will receive education, pre-professional training, and free hostel facilities in the concerned government institutions.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a resident of Chhattisgarh. The applicant should have a disability of 40% or more. The applicant's age should be more than 6 years and less than 10 years. The monthly income of the applicant's parents/guardians should be less than ₹8,000/-.

steps: On receipt of application, admission will be given as per eligibility on the recommendation of the committee constituted in the concerned institution.

documents_required: Passport-size photograph Identity proof i.e. Aadhaar card Domicile certificate of Chhattisgarh Proof of age Disability certificate Any other documents as required
